item.title: Congenital Ptosis Surgery
item.author: drvishal@kalpanaaesthetics.com (Kalpana Aesthetics)
item.description: Congenital Ptosis Surgery in Jaipur Dr Vishal Purohit, a renowned plastic surgeon in the city, has recently performed a successful surgery to correct congenital ptosis. Congenital ptosis, also known as droopy eyelids, is a condition where the upper eyelids are abnormally low. It is usually present at birth, but can also develop in childhood. Dr Purohit performed the surgery on a young patient, who had been suffering from the condition since birth.
